queries.name: AddGIStoForms
queries.query: insert into GIS2Forms(GISRecordId,RelatedFormGUID,AddedBy,AddedTime) values(:GISRecordId,:RelatedFormGUID,:AddedBy,:AddedTime)

queries.name: AddingVendorsToForm
queries.query: insert into Vendors2Form(RelatedFormGUID,SharedOn,VendorId) values(:RelatedFormGUID,:SharedOn,:VendorId)

queries.name: AddUsersToVendor
queries.query: insert into  VendorUsers(VendorId,UserId,JoiningDate) values(:VendorId,:UserId,:JoiningDate)

queries.name: AdminsMunicipalities
queries.query: select M.* from Municipalities M,Roles R,Users U where U.ID=:user and U.ID=R.UserId and R.MunicipalityId=M.ID  and R.RoleName='MunicipalityAdmin'

queries.name: AdminVendorsList
queries.query: select V.* from Vendor V,VendorAdmins VM,Users U where U.ID=:user and VM.UserId=U.ID and VM.VendorId=V.ID

queries.name: bannedDetails
queries.query: select Banned from Users where Email =:emailid
queries.comment: user to display banner dertails based on user emailid

queries.name: CheckingUserWithInVendorUsers
queries.query: select count(*) as exist from VendorUsers where UserId=:user and VendorId=:vendor

queries.name: CheckingUserWithMunicipalityInRoles
queries.query: select count(*) as exist from Roles where MunicipalityId=:muncipality and UserId=:user and RoleName='MunicipalityEmployee'

queries.name: CompanyFormsByVendorId
queries.query: from MasterForms where Closed=:closed and  FormGUID IN (select relatedFormGuid from Vendors2form where vendorId=:vendorId )

queries.name: CountOfCompnayFormsByVendorId
queries.query: select count(*) as count from MasterForms where Closed=:closed and  FormGUID IN (select RelatedFormGUID from Vendors2Form where VendorId=:vendorId )

queries.name: CountOfFormsForMunicipality
queries.query: select count(distinct FT.ID) from FormTypes FT,FormCategoryMapping FM,FormCategories FC where FC.MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId and FC.ID=FM.FormCategoryId and FM.FormTypeId=FT.ID

queries.name: CountOfMuncipalityApplicationsByVendor
queries.query: select count(*) as count from VendorApprovals where VendorId=:VendorId

queries.name: CountOfProcessFormsByMuncipality
queries.query: select count(*) as count from MasterForms MF,MunicipalityGroupMembers GM,MunicipalityGroups MG where GM.UserId=:UserId and GM.MunicipalityGroupId=MG.ID and MG.ID=MF.AssignedToGroupId and MF.MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId and MF.Closed=:closed

queries.name: CountOfUserForms
queries.query: select count(*) as count from MasterForms where Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or FormGUID IN (select RelatedGUID from  SharedWith where SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
queries.comment: To get count for open or closed for user and SharedWith user

queries.name: CountOfUserFormsForMunicipality
queries.query: select count(*) as count from MasterForms where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId and Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or FormGUID IN (select RelatedGUID from  SharedWith where SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
queries.comment: To get count for open or closed by municipality for user and sharedWith user

queries.name: CountOfVendors
queries.query: select count(*) as CountOfVendors from VendorAdmins where UserId=:vendor

queries.name: CountOfVendorUsers
queries.query: select count(*) as CountOfVendorUsers from VendorUsers where VendorId=:vendor

queries.name: DeleteCategoryMapping
queries.query: delete from FormCategoryMapping where FormTypeId=:form

queries.name: DeleteExistingSubscriptionsForUser
queries.query: delete from UserSubscriptions where UserId=:user

queries.name: DeleteFromVendorAdmins
queries.query: delete from VendorAdmins where UserId=:user and VendorId=:vendor

queries.name: DeleteFromVendorUsers
queries.query: delete from VendorUsers where UserId=:user and VendorId=:vendor

queries.name: deleteMunicipalityGroup
queries.query: delete from MunicipalityGroupMembers where MunicipalityGroupId =:MunicipalityGroupId AND UserId =:UserId
queries.comment: deleteMunicipalityGroup based on userID and MunicipalityGroupId

queries.name: DeleteRoleForMuncipality
queries.query: delete from Roles where RoleName=:role and MunicipalityId=:municipality and UserId=:user

queries.name: deleteToken
queries.query: delete from UserPasswordResetTokens where Token =:token
queries.comment: to deleted token after changing password

queries.name: EmployeesMunicipalities
queries.query: select M.* from Municipalities M,Roles R,Users U where U.ID=:user and U.ID=R.UserId and R.MunicipalityId=M.ID and R.RoleName='MunicipalityEmployee'

queries.name: EmployeesOrAdminsMunicipalities
queries.query: select M.* from Municipalities M,Roles R,Users U where U.ID=:user and U.ID=R.UserId and R.MunicipalityId=M.ID and R.RoleName=:role

queries.name: FormsCountForMunicipalities
queries.query: select count(*) as formsCount from MasterForms where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId

queries.name: FormsForUsersAndShared
queries.query: from MasterForms where Closed=:closed and (UserId=:creatorUser or FormGUID IN (select relatedGuid from  SharedWith where SharedWithUser = :sharedWithUser ))
queries.comment: Brings all the Forms of creator and shared with user

queries.name: getEmailId
queries.query: select Email from Users where ID =:userID
queries.comment: Returns the Email ID of the Respective UserID

queries.name: GetFormsForMunicpality
queries.query: select DISTINCT * from FormTypes where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId

queries.name: getFormTypeFieldsByTypeId
queries.query: FROM FormTypeFields WHERE FormTypeId=:formTypeId order by DisplayOrder asc

queries.name: GetFormTypesByCategoriesAndMunicipalities
queries.query: select FT.* from FormTypes FT,FormCategoryMapping FM,FormCategories FC where FC.ID=:formCategory and FC.ID=FM.FormCategoryId and FM.FormTypeId=FT.ID and FT.Active=:isActive and FT.MunicipalityInternalForm=:MunicipalityInternalForm

queries.name: getListofGroupName
queries.query: select ID,GroupName from MunicipalityGroups where ID IN :MunicipalityGroupID AND MunicipalityId =:MunicipalityID
queries.comment: get all the list of group Names based on mun ID

queries.name: getListofUsers
queries.query: select a.UserId , b.Email from Roles a INNER JOIN Users b on a.UserId = b.ID where a.RoleName IN ('MunicipalityEmployee','MunicipalityAdmin') and a.MunicipalityId =:municipalityID and b.Email LIKE LOWER(concat('%',:Email,'%'))
queries.comment: to get List of user based on municipality ID and role Name

queries.name: getMunicipalityGroupIdIDs
queries.query: select MunicipalityGroupId from MunicipalityGroupMembers where UserId =:userID
queries.comment: get all the group Details based on userID

queries.name: GetProcessGroupMemebersByFormGUID
queries.query: select MGM.*,MG.GroupName from MunicipalityGroupMembers MGM,MunicipalityGroups MG, MasterForms MF where  MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID and MG.ID=MF.AssignedToGroupId and MG.ID=MGM.MunicipalityGroupId

queries.name: GetRolesForMunicipality
queries.query: select U.* from Users U,Roles R where  R.RoleName=:role and R.MunicipalityId=:municipality and R.UserId=U.ID

queries.name: getRolesForUser
queries.query: SELECT RoleName, MunicipalityId FROM Roles WHERE UserId=:userId
queries.comment: Get a simple list of a user's roles

queries.name: getUserID
queries.query: select ID from Users where Email =:Email
queries.comment: get user id based on mail id

queries.name: getUserIdFromPasswordResetToken
queries.query: select UserId from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)
queries.comment: Returns a UserID, given a valid password reset token. Used internally

queries.name: GetWriteAccessGroupMembersByFormGUID
queries.query: select MGM.*,MG.GroupName from MunicipalityGroupMembers MGM,MunicipalityGroups MG, MasterForms MF,FormStatuses FS where  MF.FormGUID=:FormGUID and MF.FormStatusId=FS.ID and FS.WriteAccess=MG.ID and MG.ID=MGM.MunicipalityGroupId

queries.name: InsertCategoryMapping
queries.query: insert into FormCategoryMapping(FormTypeId,FormCategoryId) values(:FormTypeId,:FormCategoryId)

queries.name: InsertGroups
queries.query: insert into MunicipalityGroups (GroupName,GroupDescription,MunicipalityId) values (:GroupName,:GroupDescription,:MunicipalityId)

queries.name: InsertNewRole
queries.query: insert into Roles(RoleName,MunicipalityId,Description,UserId) values (:RoleName,:MunicipalityId,:Description,:UserId)

queries.name: InsertSubscription
queries.query: insert into UserSubscriptions(UserId,MunicipalityId,DateSubscribed) values(:UserId,:MunicipalityId,:DateSubscribed)

queries.name: ManualFeeTypeCountForMunicipality
queries.query: Select count(*) from ManualFeeTypes where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId

queries.name: MapAsAdminForVendor
queries.query: insert into VendorAdmins(UserId,VendorId) values(:UserId,:VendorId)

queries.name: MunicipalitiesGroupsCounts
queries.query: select count(*) as groupsCount from MunicipalityGroups where MunicipalityId=:municipality

queries.name: MunicipalityCount
queries.query: select count(*) as municipalitiesCount from Municipalities

queries.name: ProcessFormsForUserByMunicipality
queries.query: from MasterForms MF,MunicipalityGroupMembers GM,MunicipalityGroups MG where GM.userId=:UserId and GM.municipalityGroupId=MG.id and MG.id=MF.assignedToGroupId and MF.municipalityId=:MunicipalityId and MF.closed=:Closed
queries.comment: Get forms from Master Forms where employee is in group of that in current form Status

queries.name: RecordFormHistory
queries.query: insert into FormHistory(FormGUID,FormTypeId,NewStatusId,OldStatusId,Comments,CreatedBy,CreatedTime) values(:FormGUID,:FormTypeId,:NewStatusId,:OldStatusId,:Comments,:CreatedBy,SYSDATETIME())

queries.name: resetPasswordForUser
queries.query: UPDATE Users SET Password=:newPassword where ID in (select UserId from UserPasswordResetTokens where ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() and Token = :token)
queries.comment: Resets password for a user, given user ID as Integer and password as String.

queries.name: resetPasswordWithTokenForUser
queries.query:
DELETE FROM UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE UserId = :userid 
INSERT INTO UserPasswordResetTokens (UserId, Token, ExpirationDate) VALUES ( :userid, :token, DATEADD(day, 2, GETDATE()))
queries.comment: This saves a reset password token in the DB given a User ID and Token.

queries.name: SetPrimaryVendorStatusForFormandVendor
queries.query: update Vendors2Form set PrimaryVendor=:pv where RelatedFormGUID=:form and VendorID=:vendor

queries.name: StandardUserMunicipalites
queries.query: select M.* from Municipalities M,UserSubscriptions US,Users U where U.ID=:USER and U.ID=US.UserId and US.MunicipalityId=M.ID ORDER BY M.MunicipalityName ASC

queries.name: SubDivisonCount
queries.query: select count(*) as SubDivisonCount from Subdivisions where MunicipalityId=:municipalityId

queries.name: UpdateAsCXVendorAdmin
queries.query: update Roles set roleName=:role,MunicipalityId=:municipality where UserId=:user

queries.name: UpdateCFInProfile
queries.query: Update Users set CommunicationFrequency=:cf where ID=:user

queries.name: UpdateDevFormDetailsForCXAdmin
queries.query: UPDATE FormTypes set Report=:Report, FormTableName=:FormTableName where ID=:form

queries.name: UpdateFormStatusInMasterForms
queries.query: Update MasterForms set FormStatusId=:formStatus, Closed=:closed where FormGUID=:FormGUID

queries.name: UpdateGlobalEmailSig
queries.query: Update Municipalities set GlobalEmailSig=:gs where ID=:municipality

queries.name: UpdateInfoFromMyProfile
queries.query: Update Users set FirstName=:fn,LastName=:ln,Email=:em,PhoneNumber=:ph,Address1=:ad1,Address2=:ad2,StateId=:st,City=:ct,Country=:ctry,PostalCode=:pc where ID=:user

queries.name: UpdateMunicipalityInfo
queries.query: Update Municipalities set MunicipalityName=:mn,Email=:em,Phone=:ph,Address1=:ad1,Address2=:ad2,StateId=:st,City=:ct,PostalCode=:pc where ID=:municipality

queries.name: UpdateNewPassword
queries.query: UPDATE Users SET Password=:password where ID=:newUser

queries.name: UpdatePasswordAndCF
queries.query: UPDATE Users SET Password=:password, CommunicationFrequency=:cf where ID=:newUser

queries.name: UpdatePrimaryVendorInMasterForms
queries.query: Update MasterForms set CXVendorId=:VendorId where FormGUID=:FormGUID

queries.name: UpdatePrimaryVendorStatusInVEndor2Forms
queries.query: update Vendors2Form set PrimaryVendor=:pv where RelatedFormGUID=:form

queries.name: UpdateProcessOwnersForGUID
queries.query: update MasterForms set AssignedToGroupId=:AssignedToGroupId where FormGUID=:GUID

queries.name: UpdateRoleForMunicipality
queries.query: update Roles set RoleName=:role where MunicipalityId=:municipality and UserId=:user

queries.name: UpdateVendorForMasterForms
queries.query: update MasterForms set CXVendorId=:CXVendorId where FormGUID=:FormGUID

queries.name: UpdateVendorStatus
queries.query: Update VendorApprovals set DateApproved=:DateApproved,ApprovedBy=:ApprovedBy,ExpiresDate=:ExpiresDate,Active=:Active,ApprovalStatus=:ApprovalStatus,Reviewer=:Reviewer where MunicipalityId=:municipality and VendorId=:vendor

queries.name: UpdateWorkMunicipality
queries.query: Update Municipalities set MondayYN=:monday,TuesdayYN=:tuesday,WednesdayYN=:wednesday,ThursdayYN=:thursday,FridayYN=:friday,SaturdayYN=:saturday,SundayYN=:sunday,TimeZone=:timezone,OpenTime=:openTime,CloseTime=:closeTime where ID=:municipalityId

queries.name: UserCount
queries.query: select count(*) as usersCount from Users

queries.name: userSubscriptionsCount
queries.query: select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCount from UserSubscriptions

queries.name: userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality
queries.query: select count(*) as userSubscriptionsCountForMunicipality from UserSubscriptions where MunicipalityId=:municipalityId

queries.name: VendorCount
queries.query: select count(*) as VendorCount from Vendor

queries.name: VendorsCountForMunicipalities
queries.query: select count(*) as vendorsCount from VendorApprovals where MunicipalityId=:MunicipalityId

queries.name: VendorsLinkedWithForm
queries.query: from Vendor where id IN (select vendorId from Vendors2form where relatedFormGuid=:RelatedFormGUID)

queries.name: verifyPasswordResetToken
queries.query: select * from UserPasswordResetTokens WHERE( ExpirationDate >= GETDATE() AND Token = :token)
queries.comment: Given a token, Validates token based on expiration date. Null returned if no tokens match or expiration date is past.
